title: What happens to today's champion selection? I got dodged itself..! and keep being banned
body: Can someone fix it and return my points!!!!!

replies.body:
Hey there,

There were issues with the server at the time you posted this thread, for more information see the thread linked below.

http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/n9F6RgnQ-client-issues-8th-apr-2016
